text:
Whenever the Planning Commission shall, by resolution, authorize a conditional use pursuant to the Planning Code, the Zoning Administrator shall immediately transmit a copy of such resolution to the Assessor. 
(Added by Ord. 113-75, App. 4/4/75; amended by Ord. 254-00, File No. 001548, App. 10/27/2000)

heading.catch_text: CONDITIONAL USE AUTHORIZED BY CITY PLANNING COMMISSION.
